verbose_text: The most parsimonious account of the reads suggest Cas9 mediated dsDNA breaks in TAS4a resulted in independent single bp insertions three bp upstream of the PAM sequence followed by strand exchange with either intra- or inter-strand versions of the TAS4b locus (a2-2 and a2-3).
evidence: Cas9-mediated dsDNA breaks in TAS4a resulted in independent single bp
